name: The Squeaky Affair
description:
The detective agency Deeper & Deeper have solved many convoluted cases in their time, but this may be the twistiest one yet. The clues just don’t seem to fit together, and there’s only one thing to be done. They’ll just have to...go deeper.

Controls

The mouse.

Team
  • Christian Camargo (Audio)
  • Luke Frisbee
  • Brian MacIntosh
